name: Your Ordinary Life, Or?
description:
Every day, you wake up, brush your teeth, and go to work. It's boring and mundane, so sometimes, you ask yourself: Is this really the best way to live?

Game is controlled by mouse only. 

Made during Gamehighed jam 2021, whose theme was YOLO.

This game uses music from Benjamin Tissot (www.bensound.com).
